mapper.select: select e_Id, s_id, p_id, d_id, Sex, Name, LoginID, Phone, UpdateTime, UpdateName, DeleteTime, DeleteName, timeliness, CreateUserName, addTime from asms.emp where e_Id = #{eId}
select e_Id, s_id, p_id, d_id, Sex, Name, LoginID, Phone, UpdateTime, UpdateName, DeleteTime, DeleteName, timeliness, CreateUserName, addTime from asms.emp limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.emp(s_id, p_id, d_id, Sex, Name, LoginID, Phone, UpdateTime, UpdateName, DeleteTime, DeleteName, timeliness, CreateUserName, addTime) values (#{sId}, #{pId}, #{dId}, #{sex}, #{name}, #{loginid}, #{phone}, #{updatetime}, #{updatename}, #{deletetime}, #{deletename}, #{timeliness}, #{createusername}, #{addtime})

insert into asms.emp(s_id, p_id, d_id, Sex, Name, LoginID, Phone, UpdateTime, UpdateName, DeleteTime, DeleteName, timeliness, CreateUserName, addTime) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.pId}, #{entity.dId}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.loginid}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.createusername}, #{entity.addtime})

insert into asms.emp(s_id, p_id, d_id, Sex, Name, LoginID, Phone, UpdateTime, UpdateName, DeleteTime, DeleteName, timeliness, CreateUserName, addTime) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.pId}, #{entity.dId}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.loginid}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.createusername}, #{entity.addtime})
on duplicate key update s_id = values(s_id) , p_id = values(p_id) , d_id = values(d_id) , Sex = values(Sex) , Name = values(Name) , LoginID = values(LoginID) , Phone = values(Phone) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , timeliness = values(timeliness) , CreateUserName = values(CreateUserName) , addTime = values(addTime)
mapper.update:
update asms.emp
s_id = #{sId},
p_id = #{pId},
d_id = #{dId},
Sex = #{sex},
Name = #{name},
LoginID = #{loginid},
Phone = #{phone},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
timeliness = #{timeliness},
CreateUserName = #{createusername},
addTime = #{addtime},
where e_Id = #{eId}
